segments.text: Hello , the International Hotel . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to make a reservation for eight tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time would you like your table ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At 7:30 pm . And I would like to sit in the non-smoking area .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to sit in the hall or in the private room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait for a moment , please . Let me check whether the private room is available or not . No problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be for business dinner . Reserve it under the name of Nova , the manager of Fashion Clothes Company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . A reservation for eight at7 : 30 , Room 208 . Please don't be more than half hour late , or we will have to give it to other guests .
segments.speaker: S1
